# History
----

## 3.9.0 / 2016-01-19

- support pinned and paging columns.

## 3.8.0

- Add `onRowClick`

## 3.7.0

- Add `childenIndent`

## 3.6.0 / 2015-11-11

- add defaultExpandedRowKeys/expandedRowKeys/onExpandedRowsChange prop

## 3.5.0 / 2015-11-03

- Add colSpan and rowSpan support

## 3.3.0 / 2015-10-27

- support react 0.14

## 3.2.0 / 2015-09-09

- add expandIconAsCell prop
